mapper.select: select audio_idx, audiotitle, b.id, b.album_idx, audiofilename, artistname, albumName, regidate, imagename from audioboard b inner join album a on b.album_idx=a.album_idx where b.id=#{param1} order by regidate desc
mapper.insert: insert into audioboard(audio_idx, audiotitle, id, album_idx, audiofilename, artistname, contents, imagename, category, party) values(seq_audioboard.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, #{param8}, #{param9})
mapper.select: select * from audioboard WHERE ID=#{0} AND ROWNUM=1 ORDER BY regidate DESC
